newsitem.title: USA: July replacement lead battery shipments fall.
newsitem.headline: July replacement lead battery shipments fall.

text.p: Shipments of replacement auto lead acid batteries in July in the United States fell 8.72 percent to 6,231,876 units compared to the previous month, the Battery Council International reported.
In the first seven months of the year, replacement battery shipments were up 5.78 percent to 41,704,823 units.
July shipments were 8.02 percent above July 1995's total of 5,769,124 units.
In the 12 months ended July 1996, shipments were up 2.9 percent to 79,329,151 units.
